author: Loraine C
title: The facilities let this place down but the staff make the stay great
text:
We stayed here on a Sunday night for one night.Hotel was easy to find.Staff very welcoming and extremely helpful.Left luggage room is a godsend we were allowed to drop bags off before check in and again after we checked out.Check in was painless.Good base for seeing east London and quick transport links to city centre.
The room was a bit of a let down.Firstly we asked for lower floor room and got fourth floor when the fifth floor is top floor.one of the lifts was out of order for the duration of our stay.The room was clean but smelt strongly of food.Room seemed to be chilly.The bed was horrendous.Mattress was bad in that I was high up my partner low down.Great shower looks like bath was removed to make way for decent shower.No toiletries provided,not enough towels despite the booking being for two.We could hear the guests in room next door switching lights on and off etc
All the staff were so polite and friendly I cannot fault them.The free breakfast was amazing every type of food possible for breakfast provided buffet style.Loved the breakfast relaxed environment in which to eat it also.Clean hotel friendly staff great food shame about the bad bed.Would stay again though due to the positives.
